{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    t = ft.Text(
        value="Hello, world!",
        color="red",
        size=50,
        bgcolor="blue",
        italic=True,
    )

    page.add(t)

ft.app(target=main)"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このコントロールは、もちろん複数個設置することができます。次のように書いてみましょう。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(name=ft.Icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE)
    field = ft.TextField(label="名前を入力")
    button = ft.FilledButton(text="送信")

    page.add(icon, field, button)

ft.app(target=main)"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"main関数内で複数のコントロールを定義し、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"page.add()","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"に複数のコントロールを引数として渡すことで、次のようなウィンドウが表示されます。","href":null}]}
